array.string: In '03 @rwenderlich went running with the bulls. One knocked him over but @bc_phillips saved him
One day @rwenderlich made this popular video: youtube.com/watch?v=9jt6OenH6Z8
When @rwenderlich was a kid he pretended to be a hero named RaZe. His company is razeware.com
@mattjgalloway lives in London where he spends most of his time at work on iOS projects
@mattjgalloway created an app called @BeerMap which helps you find great beer and pubs
@mattjgalloway studied Electrical & Information Engineering at the University of Cambridge
Not many people know this about him, but @brandontreb is incredibly good a raffles
@brandontreb first game ever was an animal racing game where the animals raced across the screen
@brandontreb started writing tutorials on http://icodeblog.com 6 months before he got his first iPhone
Marin loves cartoons and his first dream job was being an animator
Marin started programming exactly 20 years ago on an Apple ][ clone computer
Marin used to record with a band called "The Werewolves", the members of which never met in person
@fattjake loves bad scifi movies, giant mosquitos, zombies and ancient CGI creatures
@fattjake wanted to be a stand up comedian when he was a kid (still dreams of it actually)
@fattjake lived in France for several years. Met a man who introduced him to his wife. Feared for his life
@FahimFarook can read five different languages, each having its own distinct alphabet
@FahimFarook has lived in five countries for at least five months.
The first computer that @FahimFarook bought had 5MB of RAM.
@airjordan12345 loves cooking, reading programming books, basketball and video games
@airjordan12345's favorite color is pink (real men wear pink! haha)
@airjordan12345 lived in Miami for 2 years. Here he learned english and got his first programming book
@acburk is known to have a crazy sleep schedule and fall asleep in strange places http://flic.kr/p/cELKco
@acburk misses 3D Doritos badly. Do you know where he can get any?
@acburk is a quiet person. He's been jokingly told he's harder to talk to than a kid with Aspergers
@bcphillips used to manage the research department of a private investigative agency in Manhattan
@bc_phillips and @rwenderlich got lost in the Moroccan desert
Instead of using a power mower, @bc_phillips mows the grass with a scythe
